title: Lower taxes needed to help grow luxury EV segment: Audi India
description: Balbir Singh Dhillon, head, Audi India, said while the company is considering introducing more electric car models in the domestic market, and exploring the possibility of assembling them locally, policy continuity is required to make investments viable. He emphasised that subsidies are needed to drive growth in the EV segment, "till the time we reach a decent penetration level".
